## PHQ-9 vs CHAT

Psychologists often desire to draw comparisons between different mental health and behavioral assessments. One common comparison is between the Patient Health Questionnaire-9 (PHQ-9), a tool used to measure depression severity, and the Checklist for Autism in Toddlers (CHAT), which is designed to identify early signs of autism in children. Given the differences in the domains these instruments cover, conducting a comparison is not straightforward. With the help of the software tool, Harmony, comparing PHQ-9 vs CHAT has become significantly simpler and more objective. Harmony, through its advanced natural language processing capabilities, can compare and harmonize these two tests effortlessly. Simply by uploading the PDF versions of both tests to the Harmony web interface, researchers can gain insights about the correlation between each item in the PHQ-9 and CHAT. For instance, psychologists and researchers can analyze how closely an item in CHAT, like "Does your child become upset by small changes in his/her daily routine?", aligns with an item in the PHQ-9 like "Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless". This comparison of PHQ-9 vs CHAT can aid in designing more targeted interventions and therapies for clients. Harmony's multilingual support also expands the comparison beyond language barriers, allowing clinicians worldwide to utilize and benefit from the PHQ-9 vs CHAT comparison. Moreover, this method of harmonizing not only saves valuable time but also provides a higher degree of accuracy, delivering a more robust and reliable implementation of psychological assessments. Therefore, for psychologists seeking to analyze the PHQ-9 vs CHAT, Harmony truly harmonizes the process to provide an efficient, accurate, and insightful comparison.

## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and CHAT

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and CHAT into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import just CHAT into Harmony</a> - compare CHAT with other instruments
